linear.comment: Linear MCP uses OAuth - no API key needed. Browser will open for authorization.

github.comment: Replace ghp_YOUR_GITHUB_TOKEN_HERE with your actual GitHub personal access token.

mongodb.comment: MongoDB connection string. Change if using MongoDB Atlas or different port.

filesystem.comment: Replace /Users/YOUR_USERNAME/ with your actual home directory path. Must be absolute path.

notion.comment: Notion MCP uses OAuth - no API key needed. Browser will open for authorization.
